main event: A civilian reported observing a bright object in the sky near Cedarville, Ohio, which changed color and exhibited unusual movement.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 8 minutes at approximately 7:20 PM on September 8, 1961., The object changed colors from white to yellow to bluish and back to white., It moved in various directions, including hovering and sideways movements., The object was described as brighter than the brightest stars., There were comments suggesting the sighting might involve astronomical phenomena or a natural aircraft.
sighted object: a bright object changing colors in the sky
witness description: a civilian who observed the object outdoors
